description:
A request has come in from HBS, a big American broadcasting company, to work on a show together. Knowing we have to make the most of this chance, I manage to convince the first guest, LFG`s CEO, Zen, to participate and we move toward filming. On the day of the shoot, I`m taken on a tour of the set to go over the content of the show. Somehow, I end up locked up alone in one of the set`s jail rooms! In that moment, my memories begin to awaken...
Source: crunchyroll
